meanings.definition: Moving or capable of moving quickly
meanings.sent1: The cheetah is the fastest animal on land.
meanings.sent2: She ran the fastest in the race and won a gold medal.
meanings.sent3: The fastest squirrel in the park always beats the others to the acorns.
meanings.sent4: His fastest reflexes kicked in when he dodged the flying ball.
meanings.sent5: The fastest car in the world can reach incredible speeds.

meanings.sent1: He completed the puzzle fastest among all the players.
meanings.sent2: She typed the fastest in the office, finishing her work early.
meanings.sent3: The chef chopped the vegetables fastest when preparing the meal.
meanings.sent4: Time flew by fastest when they were having fun together.
meanings.sent5: The train arrived fastest when there were no delays on the tracks.

meanings.definition: To abstain from food for a period of time
meanings.sent1: During Ramadan, Muslims fast from dawn to dusk.
meanings.sent2: She decided to fast for a day to cleanse her body.
meanings.sent3: The doctor advised him to fast before the blood test.
meanings.sent4: He chose to fast as a way to practice self-discipline.
meanings.sent5: Fasting for religious reasons is a common practice in many cultures.
